body_content.explanation: a type of high-quality almond (= a type of nut), grown especially in Spain:
examples: Many types of sweet almond are produced in Spain, most notably the Jordan almond.
Blanch the Jordan almonds for two minutes before draining and rubbing off the skins.

body_content.explanation: a sweet made of an almond (= a type of nut) inside a smooth, hard sugar shell:
examples: You've got to have Jordan almonds at your wedding; it's tradition.
I'm not so keen on Jordan almonds; they are too hard for me.
